Tool

NameGet Grid from Virtual Point Cloud
ID5
AuthorV. Wichmann, LASERDATA GmbH (c) 2014
Specificationinteractive

Description

The module allows one to retrieve a grid from a virtual point cloud dataset by dragging a box (AOI) in a Map View. Optionally, the query can be constrained by providing an attribute field and a value range that must be met. A virtual point cloud dataset is a simple XML format with the file extension .spcvf, which can be created with the 'Create Virtual Point Cloud Dataset' module.
